title: Calories in a Mini 3 Musketeers
meta_description: Learn calories in a mini 3 musketeers bar, including carbs, sugars, fat, and full nutrition facts for this fun-size treat.
assumptions: Standard mini fun-size bar (~10g), milk chocolate with nougat filling, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, and manufacturing; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A mini 3 Musketeers bar contains about 45 calories, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a mini 3 Musketeers?
What are the carbs in a mini 3 Musketeers?
faqs.a: Approximately 9g carbs, with 8g sugars and 0g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a mini 3 Musketeers low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 1g total fat, including 0.7g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How does a mini compare to a full-size 3 Musketeers?
faqs.a: A mini has 45 kcal; full-size is around 250 kcal for 60g.

faqs.q: Any protein in a mini 3 Musketeers?
faqs.a: Minimal, about 0.5g protein per mini bar.
